books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society under constant surveillance.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A romantic novel that explores the themes of love, reputation, and class.

books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: An adventure novel following Bilbo Baggins as he joins a group of dwarves on a quest.

books.title: War and Peace
books.author: Leo Tolstoy
books.description: A historical novel set during the Napoleonic wars, dealing with complex themes of society, war, and love.
